titles.title: Electing Members to a certain standing committee of the House of Representatives.
Electing Members to a certain standing committee of the House of Representatives.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

term.name: House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Elects specified Members to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.
